channel.title: CI/CD
channel.description: Say Goodbye to Makefile - Use Taskfile to Manage Tasks in CI/CD Pipelines and LocallyWhen I work with pipelines, what you might call CI, or CI/CD, I have “special” requirements that might not be the same as what others might have, or, more likely, what others think of. From Makefile to Justfile (or Taskfile): Recipe Runner ReplacementWhen I work locally, if I need to create a cluster I just execute cluster-create, wait for a few moments, and a local cluster with everything I need is running.
